name: Zombardment
description:
In this World that is filled with loads of ruthless, weird Creatures, the only possible solution to stop them is by destroying their Spawners. Explore new Areas, Find new Creatures and Earn Money by killing them. Buy new Weapons and show the zombie hordes what you've got!



~Features
  • 20+ Action Packed Levels
  • Various 'Party Modes' included!
  • Challenging Boss Fights on completing Chapters
  • In Game Shop
  • Explore New Areas/Different Chapters
  • Unlock several Achievements
  • Zombie waves get difficult with time/Engaging Gameplay


Enjoy several different modes including
'Timed' and 'Endless'.
Play, Earn money, Test your new Guns and Set Highscores here!



Use your coins to play Resistance. Defend your treasury here.
If you win, you lose money, but victory makes you RICH!
